channel.title: Cammy-Pvp 317 Online 24/7 Staff needed!
channel.description:
[b][u]Cammy-Pvp 2013 Staff needed[/u][/b] Drop party at 15 players! [u][b]Features[/b][/u] All magic spells working. Vengeance works aswell with actual astral rune model. A Pk point shop with a lot of rares to buy. Bosses such as Dagganoth rex, Kq, Kbd, and General Graardor how ever you spell his name. Donator status and Donator zone with npcs that restore your prayer, hp, and special attack. Then a donator shop with items just for donators. You can click on your combat skills and choose what ever level you want it to be. Barrow armours with correct and fully working effects. This server is a spawn/eco server. Prestige system, goes from 1-10 and you gain a reward from the pkp shop each time you prestige and a new yell title. Then once your 10th prestige you get to use ::10thgear.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bHDLg4SNZow[/youtube]
Forums: http://cammy-pvpz.webs.com
Client Download: http://uppit.com/lt2wix0jif6o/Cammy-Pvp_client_by_Joey.rar

You can click on your combat skills and choose what ever level you want it to be.

This server is a spawn/eco server.
Prestige system, goes from 1-10 and you gain a reward from the pkp shop each time you prestige and a new yell title. Then once your 10th prestige you get to use ::10thgear.
